title.rendered: Samsung EP-TA20UWE 2 A UK Mains Fast Charging Adapter

content.rendered:
Product Description

Samsung EP-TA20UWE Fast Adaptive 2.0 AMP USB Power Adaptor full with EP-DG925UWZ Micro USB charging cable. The 2AMP Fast Charger will imply that your Samsung Smartphone shall be totally charged always. It is light-weight and simple to move.

Box Contains

Charger

Make positive this matches by coming into your mannequin quantity.
2 AMP Out-put for fast and handy charging
Fast Adaptive charger
Sync and switch recordsdata utilizing the micro USB Data Cable
(*2*)
